short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search products through taobao.com and jingdong.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
有的时候需要查询一些商品，每次都要重新在搜索引擎里搜索淘宝或者京东，觉得比较麻烦，就开发了这样一个查询的工具，用法简单（选择文本，右击，或者快捷键Ctrl+Shift+Z）。之前已经写过一个搜索豆瓣评分的，这个写起来并不复杂。希望可以帮到你。如果涉及侵权，请与我联系，我会及时删除。

Sometimes I need to query some products, but every time I have to search for Taobao or Jingdong in the search engine. It feels more troublesome. I have developed such a query tool and it is easy to use (select text, right click, or use shortcut Ctrl + Shift+ Z). I have already developed a tool for the Douban's score. I hope this tool could help you. If it involves infringement, please contact me(wpy1174555847@outlook.com) and I will delete it in time.
